meaningMnemonic: The <radical>hole</radical> leading to the <radical>private</radical> <radical>heart</radical> of your house is the <kanji>window</kanji>. Or maybe it's just the window to your soul, and not your house. Like the poetry people say.
readingMnemonic: You realize that a ton of people are looking into your <kanji>window</kanji> and seeing all your private things. This makes you <reading>mad</reading> (まど)! What right do they have to know your private thoughts and desires?!
